parameters.name: Workload
parameters.query:
OfficeActivity
| summarize Count= count() by OfficeWorkload
| extend label = strcat(OfficeWorkload, " - ", Count)
| project OfficeWorkload, label

parameters.name: UserType
parameters.query:
OfficeActivity
| summarize Count= count() by UserType
| extend label = strcat(UserType, " - ", Count)
| project UserType, label

content.query:
OfficeActivity
| where "*" in ({Workload}) or OfficeWorkload in ({Workload}) 
| where "*" in ({UserType}) or UserType in ({UserType})
| summarize count() by OfficeWorkload, bin_at(TimeGenerated, 1h, now())
content.title: Office activity, by workload

content.query:
OfficeActivity 
| where "*" in ({Workload}) or OfficeWorkload in ({Workload}) 
| where "*" in ({UserType}) or UserType in ({UserType})
| summarize count() by OfficeWorkload
 | sort by count_
content.title: Activity, by workload

content.query:
OfficeActivity 
| where "*" in ({Workload}) or OfficeWorkload in ({Workload}) 
| where "*" in ({UserType}) or UserType in ({UserType})
| where ItemType != '' 
| summarize count() by ItemType
 | sort by count_
content.title: Activity, by type

content.query:
OfficeActivity 
| where "*" in ({Workload}) or OfficeWorkload in ({Workload}) 
| where "*" in ({UserType}) or UserType in ({UserType})
| summarize count() by UserType
 | sort by count_
content.title: Activity, by user type

content.query:
//Admin operations ordered by number 
OfficeActivity 
| where "*" in ({Workload}) or OfficeWorkload in ({Workload}) 
| where UserType == 'Admin' 
| summarize count() by Operation 
| order by count_
content.title: Admin activities, by type

content.query:
OfficeActivity
| where "*" in ({Workload}) or OfficeWorkload in ({Workload}) 
| where "*" in ({UserType}) or UserType in ({UserType})
| summarize Update = countif(Operation contains 'update'), Create = countif(Operation contains 'create'), Delete = countif(Operation contains 'delete'), Add = countif(Operation contains 'add') by bin_at(TimeGenerated, 1d, now())
content.title: Update, create, add, and delete activities

content.query:
OfficeActivity 
| where "*" in ({Workload}) or OfficeWorkload in ({Workload}) 
| where "*" in ({UserType}) or UserType in ({UserType})
| where TimeGenerated >= ago(14d) 
| where Operation contains 'group' 
| summarize count() by bin(TimeGenerated, 1d) 
| extend Week = iff(TimeGenerated>ago(7d), 'This Week', 'Last Week'), TimeGenerated = iff(TimeGenerated>ago(7d), TimeGenerated, TimeGenerated +7d)
content.title: Group activities, per week

content.query:
OfficeActivity 
| where "*" in ({Workload}) or OfficeWorkload in ({Workload}) 
| where "*" in ({UserType}) or UserType in ({UserType})
| where TimeGenerated >= ago(14d) 
| where Operation contains 'user' 
| summarize count() by bin(TimeGenerated, 1d) 
| extend Week = iff(TimeGenerated>ago(7d), 'This Week', 'Last Week'), TimeGenerated = iff(TimeGenerated>ago(7d), TimeGenerated, TimeGenerated +7d)
content.title: User activities, per week

content.query:
OfficeActivity 
| where "*" in ({Workload}) or OfficeWorkload in ({Workload}) 
| where "*" in ({UserType}) or UserType in ({UserType})
| where Operation contains 'Folder' 
| summarize count() by Operation
 | sort by count_
content.title: Folder changes

content.query:
OfficeActivity 
| where "*" in ({Workload}) or OfficeWorkload in ({Workload}) 
| where "*" in ({UserType}) or UserType in ({UserType})
| where Operation contains 'File' 
| summarize count() by Operation
 | sort by count_
content.title: File changes

content.query:
OfficeActivity
| where "*" in ({Workload}) or OfficeWorkload in ({Workload}) 
| where "*" in ({UserType}) or UserType in ({UserType})
| top 100 by TimeGenerated
| project TimeGenerated, RecordType, Operation, UserType, UserKey, OfficeWorkload, UserId, Parameters, SourceSystem
content.title: Recent activity

content.query:
let data = OfficeActivity
| where "*" in ({Workload}) or OfficeWorkload in ({Workload}) 
| where "*" in ({UserType}) or UserType in ({UserType});
let appData = data
| summarize TotalCount = count() by UserId
| join kind=inner (data
    | make-series Trend = count() default = 0 on bin(TimeGenerated, 1d) in range({TimeRange:start}, {TimeRange:end}, {TimeRange:grain}) by UserId
    | project-away TimeGenerated) on UserId
| order by TotalCount desc, UserId asc
| project UserId, TotalCount, Trend
| serialize Id = row_number();
data
| summarize TotalCount = count() by Operation , UserId
| join kind=inner (data
    | make-series Trend = count() default = 0 on bin(TimeGenerated, 1d) in range({TimeRange:start}, {TimeRange:end}, {TimeRange:grain}) by UserId, Operation
    | project-away TimeGenerated) on UserId, Operation
| order by TotalCount desc, UserId asc
| project UserId, Operation, TotalCount, Trend
| serialize Id = row_number(1000000)
| join kind=inner (appData) on UserId
| project Id, Name = Operation, Type = 'Operation', ['Operation Count'] = TotalCount, Trend, ParentId = Id1
| union (appData 
    | project Id, Name = UserId, Type = 'UserId', ['Operation Count'] = TotalCount, Trend )
| order by ['Operation Count'] desc, Name asc
content.title: User activities

content.query:
//Top sharepoint client IPS
OfficeActivity
| where ("*" in ({Workload}) or OfficeWorkload in ({Workload})) and OfficeWorkload in ('OneDrive', 'SharePoint') 
| where "*" in ({UserType}) or UserType in ({UserType})
| summarize Number = count() by Operation
| top 10 by Number
content.title: Top 10 activities

content.query:
//Files Downloaded by type
OfficeActivity
| where ("*" in ({Workload}) or OfficeWorkload in ({Workload})) and OfficeWorkload in ('OneDrive', 'SharePoint') 
| where "*" in ({UserType}) or UserType in ({UserType})
| where Operation == 'FileDownloaded'
| summarize count() by SourceFileExtension
content.title: Files downloaded, by extension

content.query:
//Files Uploaded by type 
OfficeActivity 
| where ("*" in ({Workload}) or OfficeWorkload in ({Workload})) and OfficeWorkload in ('OneDrive', 'SharePoint') 
| where "*" in ({UserType}) or UserType in ({UserType})
| where Operation == 'FileUploaded' 
| summarize count() by SourceFileExtension
 | sort by count_
content.title: Files uploaded, by extension

content.query:
//Top sharepoint sites 
OfficeActivity 
| where ("*" in ({Workload}) or OfficeWorkload in ({Workload})) and OfficeWorkload in ('OneDrive', 'SharePoint') 
| where "*" in ({UserType}) or UserType in ({UserType})
| where Site_Url != ''
| summarize Number = count() by Site_Url 
| top 10 by Number
content.title: Top 10 sites

content.query:
//Mailbox Logins by hour
OfficeActivity
| where OfficeWorkload == 'Exchange' and ("*" in ({UserType}) or UserType in ({UserType}))
| where Operation == 'MailboxLogin'
| summarize Logins = count() by bin_at(TimeGenerated, 1h, now())
content.title: Mailbox logins, by hour

content.query:
//Exchange operations that are performed by actors outside your organization - external
OfficeActivity
| where OfficeWorkload == 'Exchange' and "*" in ({UserType}) or UserType in ({UserType})
| where ExternalAccess == 'True' 
| summarize count() by Operation
 | sort by count_
content.title: External access activities, by activities

content.query:
OfficeActivity 
| where OfficeWorkload == 'Exchange' and  "*" in ({UserType}) or UserType in ({UserType})
| summarize count() by UserType 
 | sort by count_
content.title: Activities, by user type
